<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Macro version information number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint16&#95;t Version = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The bits of the flags field are interpreted as a set of flags, some of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// which may indicate that additional fields follow. The following flags,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// beginning with the least significant bit, are defined:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// offset&#95;size&#95;flag:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   If the offset&#95;size&#95;flag is zero, the header is for a 32-bit DWARF</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   format macro section and all offsets are 4 bytes long; if it is one,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   the header is for a 64-bit DWARF format macro section and all offsets</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   are 8 bytes long.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// debug&#95;line&#95;offset&#95;flag:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   If the debug&#95;line&#95;offset&#95;flag is one, the debug&#95;line&#95;offset field (see</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   below) is present. If zero, that field is omitted.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// opcode&#95;operands&#95;table&#95;flag:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   If the opcode&#95;operands&#95;table&#95;flag is one, the opcode&#95;operands&#95;table</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   field (see below) is present. If zero, that field is omitted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t Flags = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// debug&#95;line&#95;offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   An offset in the .debug&#95;line section of the beginning of the line</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   number information in the containing compilation unit, encoded as a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   4-byte offset for a 32-bit DWARF format macro section and an 8-byte</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   offset for a 64-bit DWARF format macro section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t DebugLineOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
